Family

In the draftFamilyWe're talking about how happy family people are differently. Most of the conversation about happiness has to do with children - family, foster, special - different.

Family
28-04-2023

To dream and hope

Sojong Lee and Junebum Shim are studying at the Petrozavod State Conservatory. They're the only students in Carelia from Korea. In a year and a half, in our town, they learned Russian, won a couple of professional competitions, loved snow, pancakes and honey, and they want to find a job here.

Family
17-04-2023

"A little mom, a little dad, a little god."

It's a good story about how the life of a man saving others at desperate moments of their lives can change. Or how the support of Ludmila Dragunova, which created the Mama House Charity Fund for single moms with small children, suddenly led to the creation of his own family. Now her husband, Vladimir, in Mama's house, is a little dad, a little mecent and a little god.

Family
23-11-2022

Just give us the children!

Katya is Sergei's foster daughter and Love of the Forty. They've been together for five years. The way in which the process of getting used to each other, the problems and joys of living together, and even the visits to the custody court of Golin, is frankly written in social media. What makes her so open? How does her family respond to her?

Family
29-07-2022

Anya and the engine of progress

Anya never slows the move and never stops joking. Any minute, I'm ready to hear a story on the phone from the nursery of Darik, who's doing his routine. Or he's calling Chief Goshe himself, "Doctor, I'll just ask." Any routine in this family is twisted into something unbanal and moving forward.

Family
20-07-2022

Basik

In Petrozavodsk, an eight-year-old boy runs his blog in social media. The parents and teachers of Baisangura really want the boy to develop, and he doesn't feel alone.

Family
01-06-2022

Love

Natalia Burcha of Nadvoica's settlement could be a prototype of some serial heroin. Every time fate checks her for humanity and goodness, she picks up a challenge and she tries to save someone. First, she helped Sasha in a difficult situation, then saved his children from a bad life in Siberia. Two months ago, Natalia couldn't stop taking a baby from Caluga. The girl was named love. We're talking about this amazing family story.

Family
04-05-2022

Love is incredible

Natalia Polakov is a man who can talk to who can get his taste back to life even desperate people. It is very simple that she has spoken of her experience, which has forced her to reconsider her previous views on peace. In 2015, the doctors gave Natalia an obscene diagnosis of cancer. From now on, everything around her has changed.

Family
28-02-2022

It's not our business to punish.

Elena Mazaev is not a single grandma but a two-digit. Most recently, she had a tenth grandson. She sees her " share " as joy without responsibility. In the new edition of the Family, it is a conversation about how the older generation relates to the upbringing of children.

Family
08-02-2022

Mistake per million

As an Angarsca court marshal, they tried to search for a million roubles with the father of two sons from Nadvoitz. The reason is that children are raised in the father ' s family and that their mother is deprived of parental rights.

Family
03-12-2021

Everything will be right.

Under New Year ' s family, Nikifor Kanevsky often has a history of life. Let this time the changes relate only to moving forward and upwards.

Family
24-09-2021

Not the dinosaurs.

The Republic is discussing with the love of Andrey Basova and Vladimir Ivanovich Leonov. They've been together for over 40 years. She's in favour of innovation, he's in favour of loyalty to traditions.

Family
19-04-2021

I learned to cry

Elena tells the Population about the domestic violence situation. She believes that every woman in this situation must resist and seek a solution. He is.

Family
22-10-2020

Run!

María Lobastova had organized an escape with three children from her husband ' s house in Nigeria for three weeks. Saved by local Nigerian women from charitable organizations, the Brazilian Consul, their own strategy, despair and their faith in miracles.

Family
31-07-2020

From February to April, a child lived alone

History about the Irkut boy who was raised by the family from Nadvoica settlement. They need help now.

Family
30-06-2020

Life of the great Logs.

A few times in the life of the Logki family, there was a miracle. Light met Sasha. Five more kids were added. Teleshaw gave them an apartment when there was no hope to move out of the same room. " The Republic " is talking to an unusually large family, which this year became the " Family Year " in Carelia.

Family
03-06-2020

Natasha and her children

Cellenj Planca, English for himself and the Cambridge competition, the mango on the window, the stiff and the help of the nearer, the isolation in the Kiwirian family has not been useful. The Republic had spoken to parents about the impact of the restrictive regime on family life.

Family
21-02-2020

Maninja

Mane Manuqiang is talking about his Armenian family. She herself believes that she has two homelands, but for 100 per cent of her country in Armenia, she does not feel herself. " The Republic " is opening a new cycle of the Family project on the characteristics of families of different nationalities.

Family
26-12-2018

Visiting teacher

Anya Antonov has been able to grow up for 40 years. Even her daughter Nastya told her, "Mama, you're a little girl." The rare gift of childhood allows Ana to develop clear and hidden talents through a joint game of children.

Family
25-10-2018

Family life

The Casian family, Mom, Dad and their five children, are not living under common rules. In the world, they have deliberately minimized life among the loved ones and music.

Family
27-08-2018

“This is my child.

Natalia Burcha knows everything about bad life and always saves someone. He picks up dogs and treats them. It burns birds. And she's got the same kids, especially the younger ones she saved, warmed up and left at the same time.

In a week, the hurricane is outside the window and the houses are warm.
